name: starbucks-clone
description: 1. `npm init -y` 2. `npm install -D tailwindcss` -> create `index.css` inside src folder -> `@tailwind base;@tailwind components;@tailwind utilities;` 3. `npx tailwindcss init` -> config file: `tailwind.config.js` 4. `npx tailwindcss -i ./src/index.css -o ./dist/output.css --watch`
